docs.text:
Anno documentation


For full documentation visit 
mkdocs.org
.


Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.title: Configuration

docs.text:
Glossary


Store


A store is a class adhering to the 
Store API
. It is an interface to a

storage backend
.


Top-Level Annotation
docs.title: Glossary

docs.text: A store is a class adhering to the  Store API . It is an interface to a storage backend .
docs.title: Store

docs.text:
Options


skipVersions


Return only the top-level annotation.


skipReplies


Do not include replies with an annotation.


metadataOnly


Do not include the annotation body.


includeDeleted


Include annotations that have been set to 
deleted
, which would otherwise result in a 
410
.


forceDelete


Completely remove an annotation, not just set it to 
delete
. 


Subsequent retrievals will result in 
404
 not 
410
.
docs.title: Options

docs.text: Do not include replies with an annotation.
docs.title: skipReplies

docs.text: Do not include the annotation body.
docs.title: metadataOnly

docs.text: Include annotations that have been set to  deleted , which would otherwise result in a  410 .
docs.title: includeDeleted

docs.text: Completely remove an annotation, not just set it to  delete .   Subsequent retrievals will result in  404  not  410 .
docs.title: forceDelete
